00009 // Dialog for editing diagram column properties.

00019 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 // Function: ColumnEditDialog()
00021 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 ColumnEditDialog::ColumnEditDialog(QWidget* parent, DiagramColumn const* column)
00023     : QDialog(parent), layout_(0), nameLabel_(0), typeLabel_(0), typeCombo_(0),
00024       allowedItemsGroup_(0), column_(column)
00025 {
00026     layout_ = new QGridLayout(this);
00027     
00028     // Create the name label and line edit.
00029     nameLabel_ = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00030     layout_->addWidget(nameLabel_, 0, 0, 1, 2);
00031 
00032     nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00033     layout_->addWidget(nameEdit_, 1, 0, 1, 2);
00034 
00035     // Create the type label and combo box.
00036     typeLabel_ = new QLabel(tr("Type:"), this);
00037     layout_->addWidget(typeLabel_, 2, 0, 1, 2);
00038 
00039     typeCombo_ = new QComboBox(this);
00040     typeCombo_->addItem(tr("IO"));
00041     typeCombo_->addItem(tr("Buses"));
00042     typeCombo_->addItem(tr("Components"));
00043     typeCombo_->addItem(tr("Custom"));
00044     typeCombo_->setCurrentIndex(-1);
00045 
00046     layout_->addWidget(typeCombo_, 3, 0, 1, 2);
00047 
00048     // Create the allowed items group box and check boxes.
00049     allowedItemsGroup_ = new QGroupBox(tr("Allowed Items"), this);
00050 
00051     QGridLayout* itemLayout = new QGridLayout(allowedItemsGroup_);
00052 
00053     itemCheckBoxes_[0] = new QCheckBox(tr("Interfaces"), allowedItemsGroup_);
00054     itemCheckBoxes_[1] = new QCheckBox(tr("Components"), allowedItemsGroup_);
00055     itemCheckBoxes_[2] = new QCheckBox(tr("Channels"), allowedItemsGroup_);
00056     itemCheckBoxes_[3] = new QCheckBox(tr("Bridges"), allowedItemsGroup_);
00057 
00058     for (int i = 0; i < CIT_COUNT; ++i)
00059     {
00060         itemLayout->addWidget(itemCheckBoxes_[i], i, 0, 1, 1);
00061     }
00062 
00063     layout_->addWidget(allowedItemsGroup_, 4, 0, 1, 2);
00064 
00065     // Create the OK and Cancel buttons.
00066     QPushButton* btnOK = new QPushButton(this);
00067     btnOK->setText(tr("&OK"));
00068     layout_->addWidget(btnOK, 5, 0, 1, 1);
00069 
00070     QPushButton* btnCancel = new QPushButton(this);
00071     btnCancel->setText(tr("&Cancel"));
00072     layout_->addWidget(btnCancel, 5, 1, 1, 1);
00073 
00074     // Connect the button signals to accept() and reject().
00075     QObject::connect(btnOK, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00076     QObject::connect(btnCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()));
00077     QObject::connect(typeCombo_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)), this, SLOT(onTypeChange(int)));
00078 
00079     // Fill the fields with the data from the column, if given.
00080     if (column_ != 0)
00081     {
00082         setWindowTitle(tr("Edit Column"));
00083         nameEdit_->setText(column_->getName());
00084         setAllowedItems(column_->getAllowedItems());
00085         typeCombo_->setCurrentIndex(column_->getContentType());
00086     }
00087     else
00088     {
00089         setWindowTitle(tr("Add Column"));
00090         setAllowedItems(CIT_NONE);
00091         typeCombo_->setCurrentIndex(0);
00092     }
00093 
00094     setFixedSize(sizeHint());
00095 }

00098 // Function: ~ColumnEditDialog()
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 ColumnEditDialog::~ColumnEditDialog()
00101 {
00102 }

00104 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 // Function: onTypeChange()
00106 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 void ColumnEditDialog::onTypeChange(int index)
00108 {
00109     Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00110 
00111     // Convert the index to a column content type.
00112     ColumnContentType contentType = static_cast<ColumnContentType>(index);
00113 
00114     // Set enabled/disabled based on the content type.
00115     for (int i = 0; i < CIT_COUNT; ++i)
00116     {
00117         itemCheckBoxes_[i]->setEnabled(contentType == COLUMN_CONTENT_CUSTOM);
00118     }
00119 
00120     switch (contentType)
00121     {
00122     case COLUMN_CONTENT_IO:
00123         {
00124             setAllowedItems(CIT_INTERFACE);
00125             break;
00126         }
00127 
00128     case COLUMN_CONTENT_BUSES:
00129         {
00130             setAllowedItems(CIT_CHANNEL | CIT_BRIDGE);
00131             break;
00132         }
00133 
00134     case COLUMN_CONTENT_COMPONENTS:
00135         {
00136             setAllowedItems(CIT_COMPONENT);
00137             break;
00138         }
00139 
00140     default:
00141         {
00142             break;
00143         }
00144     }
00145 }
00146 
00147 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 // Function: onTypeChange()
00149 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 void ColumnEditDialog::setAllowedItems(unsigned int allowedItems)
00151 {
00152     for (int i = 0; i < CIT_COUNT; ++i)
00153     {
00154         // Set the checked states based on the corresponding flag.
00155         itemCheckBoxes_[i]->setChecked((1 << i) & allowedItems);
00156     }
00157 }
00158 
00159 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 // Function: getName()
00161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 QString ColumnEditDialog::getName() const
00163 {
00164     return nameEdit_->text();
00165 }
00166 
00167 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168 // Function: getContentType()
00169 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 ColumnContentType ColumnEditDialog::getContentType() const
00171 {
00172     return static_cast<ColumnContentType>(typeCombo_->currentIndex());
00173 }
00174 
00175 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 // Function: getAllowedItems()
00177 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 unsigned int ColumnEditDialog::getAllowedItems() const
00179 {
00180     unsigned int allowedItems = CIT_NONE;
00181 
00182     for (int i = 0; i < CIT_COUNT; ++i)
00183     {
00184         allowedItems |= (itemCheckBoxes_[i]->isChecked() << i);
00185     }
00186 
00187     return allowedItems;
00188 }
00189 
00190 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00191 // Function: accept()
00192 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 void ColumnEditDialog::accept()
00194 {
00195     if (column_ != 0)
00196     {
00197         if (!column_->isAllowedItemsValid(getAllowedItems()))
00198         {
00199             QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00200                                tr("The column contains items that would not be "
00201                                   "allowed in the new column configuration. Please "
00202                                   "delete the items of the unallowed type before "
00203                                   "changing the column configuration."),
00204                                QMessageBox::Ok, (QWidget*)parent());
00205             msgBox.exec();
00206             return;
00207         }
00208     }
00209 
00210     QDialog::accept();
00211 }
